name: Reaching (SteelRaven7)
description:
REACHING - You can see only one arm's length ahead.

Feel your way through the darkness in this game about exploration. This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam with the theme "Only One".

Controls:
WASD - move
Mouse - look
Left click - touch
Shift - sprint
Escape - quit game

Enjoy :)

Assets I used:

Sounds based on samples from Freesound (all are public domain)
Animations from Movement Animset Pro by Kubold
FinalIK by Rootmotion for procedural animation
PBR textures from https://www.cgbookcase.com/

Everything else is made by me!
